question: Which Golfer is set to be inducted into the World Golf Hall of Fame as part of the class of 2021?
explanation:
American legendary golfer Tiger Woods will be inducted into the World Golf Hall of Fame as part of the class of 2021. 
Woods was among the 10 finalists named as candidates for 2021. Florida-based World Golf hall of fame announced that Tiger Woods, who is the winner of 15 major titles, will be inducted in the hall of fame in the male competitor category. He has secured 93 international victories and won his 15th major title last year after 11 years.
